S03n242:1: pravivekasukharasajñānāṃ viḍambaneva vihiṃseva ca kāmāḥ pratikūlā bhavanti |
S03n242:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścinmahati guṇaprakāśayaśasi vācyadoṣavirahite brāhmaṇakule janmaparigrahaṃ cakāra |
S03n242:4: tasya yatra kanīyāṃsaḥ ṣaḍapare bhrātarastadanurūpaguṇāḥ snehabahumānaguṇānnityānuguṇā babhūvuḥ,
S03n242:6: sa kṛtaśramaḥ sāṅgeṣu sopavedeṣu vedeṣu samadhigatavidyāyaśāḥ saṃmato jagati daivatavanmātāpitarau parayā bhaktyā paricarannācārya iva piteva tānbhrātṝnvidyāsu vinayannayavinayakuśalo gṛhamāvasati sma |
S03n242:7: sa kālakramānmātāpitroḥ kālakriyayā saṃvignahṛdayaḥ kṛtvā tayoḥ pretakṛtyāni vyatīteṣu śokamayeṣviva keṣucideva divaseṣu tānbhrātṝn saṃnipātyovāca-
S03n242:18: evaṃ hi vaḥ syādyaśasaḥ samṛddhirdharmasya cārthasya sukhāspadasya |
S03n242:20: athāsya bhrātaraḥ pravrajyāsaṅkīrtanādviyogāśaṅkāvyathitamanasaḥ śokāśrudurdinamukhāḥ praṇamyainamūcuḥ--nārhatyatrabhavānpitṛviyogaśokaśalyavraṇamasaṃrūḍhameva no ghaṭṭayitumapareṇa duḥkhābhinipātakṣāreṇa |
S03n242:21: adyāpi tāvatpitṛśokaśalyakṣatāni rohanti na no manāṃsi |
S03n242:22: tatsādhvimāṃ saṃhara dhīra buddhiṃ mā naḥ kṣate kṣāramihopahārṣīḥ ||5 ||
S03n242:23: athākṣamaṃ vetsi gṛhānurāgaṃ śreyaḥpathaṃ vā vanavāsasaukhyam |
S03n242:30: iti mayā nigṛhya nābhihitāḥ stha pravrajyāśrayaṃ prati jānatāpi gṛhavanavāsaviśeṣam |
S03n242:32: te saptāpi bhrātaro bhaginyaṣṭamāḥ sphītaṃ gṛhavibhavāsāramaśrumukhaṃ ca mitrasvajanabandhuvargaṃ vihāya tāpasapravrajyayā pravrajitāḥ |
S03n242:34: te'nyatarasminmahatyaraṇyāyatane jvalitamiva vikasitakamalavanaśobhayā vihasadiva ca phullakumudavanairanibhṛtamadhukaragaṇamamalanīlasalilaṃ mahatsaraḥ saṃniśritya praviviktamanojñāsu cchayādrumasamupagūḍhāsvasaṃnikṛṣṭaviniviṣṭāsu pṛthakpṛthakparṇaśālāsu vrataniyamaparā dhyānānuyuktamanaso vijahnaḥ |
S03n242:36: sa caiṣāṃ dhyānopadeśapravṛttāṃ kāmādīnavadarśanīṃ saṃvejanīyāṃ pravivekasantoṣavarṇabahulāṃ kuhanalapanakausīdyādidoṣavigarhaṇīmupaśamaprasādapaddhatiṃ tāṃ tāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ cakāra |
S03n242:37: sā cainān dāsī bahumānānurāgavaśā tathaiba paricacāra |
S03n242:38: sā tasmātsaraso bisānyuddhṛtya mahatsu padminīparṇeṣu śucau tīrapradeśe samānvinyasya ca bhāgānkāṣṭhasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena kālaṃ nivedyāpakrāmati sma |
S03n242:39: tatasteṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ kṛtajapahomavidhīnāṃ yathāvṛddhamekaiko'bhigamya tato bisabhāgamekaikaṃ yathākramamādāya svasyāṃ svasyāṃ parṇaśālāyāṃ vidhivatparibhujya dhyānābhiyuktamatirvijahāra |
S03n242:40: ta evaṃ pravṛttā naiva parasparaṃ dadṛśuranyatra dharmaśravaṇakālāt |
S03n242:41: teṣāmevaṃvidhena niravadyena śīlavṛttasamudācāreṇa pravivekābhiratyā dhyānapravaṇamānasatayā ca sarvatra yaśaḥ samupaśrutya śakro devānāmindrastatparīkṣānimittaṃ tatrābhijagāma |
S03n242:42: taccaiṣāṃ dhyānābhimukhatvaṃ kukāryeṣvaprasaṅgamanutkaṇṭhāṃ praśamābhirāmaṃ cāvasthānamavekṣya sthirataraguṇasambhāvanastatparīkṣānimittamavahitamanā babhūva |
S03n242:45: atha dvipakalabhadaśanapāṇḍukomalāni samuddhṛtya prakṣālya ca bisāni marakataharitaprabheṣu padminīpatreṣu kamaladalakesaropahārālaṃkṛtānviracayya samānbhāgānkāṣṭhasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena nivedya kālaṃ teṣāmṛṣīṇāmapasṛtāyāṃ tasyāṃ dāsyāṃ bodhisattvaparīkṣārthaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ prathamameva bisabhāgamantardhāpayāmāsa |
S03n242:46: pravartane hi duḥkhasya tiraskāre sukhasya ca |
S03n242:48: atha bodhisattvo'bhigataḥ prathame bisabhāgasthāne bisabhāgavirahitaṃ padminīpatraṃ parivyākulīkṛtopahāramabhisamīkṣya gṛhītaḥ kenāpi me bisapratyaṃśa ityavadhṛtamatirapetacetaḥsaṃkṣobhasaṃrambhastata eva pratinivṛtya praviśya parṇaśālāyāṃ yathocitaṃ dhyānavidhimārebhe |
S03n242:50: itare tvasya bhrātaro nūnamanena gṛhītaḥ pratyaṃśa iti manyamānā yathocitāneva svānsvānanukrameṇa bisabhāgānādāya yathāsvaṃ parṇaśālāsu paribhujya dhyāyanti sma |
S03n242:51: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame ca divase śakrastasya taṃ bisapratyaṃśamupanidadhe |
S03n242:55: athāparāhṇasamaye dharmaśravaṇārthamṛṣayaste yathocittaṃ bodhisattvasya parṇaśālāṃ samabhigatā dadṛśvāṃsaścainaṃ kṛśataraśarīraṃ parikṣāmakapolanayanaṃ parimlānavadanaśobhamasampūrṇasvaragāmbhīryaṃ parikṣīṇamapyaparikṣīṇadhairyapraśamaguṇamabhinavendupriyadarśanamupetyopacārapuraḥsaraṃ sasambhramāḥ kimidamiti kārśyanimittamenamapṛcchan |
S03n242:57: atha te tāpasāḥ parasparamīdṛśamanācāramasambhāvayantastatpīḍayā ca samupajātasaṃvegāḥ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamityuktvā vrīḍāvanatavadanāḥ samatiṣṭhanta |
S03n242:58: śakraprabhāvācca samāvṛtajñānagativiṣayāḥ kuta idamiti na niścayamupajagmuḥ |
S03n242:59: atha bodhisattvasyānujo bhrātā svamāvegamātmaviśuddhiṃ ca pradarśayañchapathātiśayamimaṃ cakāra-
S03n242:60: samṛddhicihnābharaṇaṃ sa gehaṃ prāpnotu bhāryāṃ ca mano'bhirāmām |
S03n242:61: samagratāmetu ca putrapautrairbisāni te brāhmaṇa yo hyahārṣīt ||11 ||
S03n242:64: kāmeṣu tīvrāṃ sa karotvapekṣāṃ bisānyahārṣīddvijamukhya yaste ||12 ||
S03n242:67: vayo'pyapaśyanramatāṃ sa gehe bisāni yaste sakṛdapyahārṣīt ||13 ||
S03n242:70: kṛtsnāṃ mahīṃ pātu sa rājavṛttyā lobhādahārṣīttava yo bisāni ||14 ||
S03n242:72: purohitaḥ so'stu narādhipasya mantrādinā svastyayayena yuktaḥ |
S03n242:73: satkāramāpnotu tathā ca rājñastavāpi yo nāma bisānyahārṣīt ||15 ||
S03n242:76: arcantu taṃ jānapadāḥ sametya biseṣu lubdho na guṇeṣu yaste ||16 ||
S03n242:78: catuḥśataṃ grāmavaraṃ samṛddhaṃ labdhvā narendrādupayātu bhoktum |
S03n242:79: avītarāgo maraṇaṃ sa caitu lobhaṃ biseṣvapyajayanna yaste ||17 ||
S03n242:84: vidyotamānāṃ bapuṣā śriyā ca patnītvamānīya narādhipastām |
S03n242:87: ekākinī sā samatītya sādhūnsvādūpabhoge praṇayaṃ karotu |
S03n242:88: satkāralabdhāṃ mudamudvahantī bisānyapaśyattava yā na dharmam ||20 ||
S03n242:89: atha tatra dharmaśravaṇārthaṃ samāgatāstadvanādhyuṣitā yakṣadviradavānarāstāṃ kathāmupaśrutya parāṃ vrīḍāṃ saṃvegaṃ copajagmuḥ |
S03n242:92: ālokasandhiṃ divasaiḥ karotu yastvayyapi praskhalito bisārtham ||21 ||
S03n242:94: ṣaḍbhirdṛḍhaiḥ pāśaśataiḥ sa bandhaṃ prāpnotu ramyācca vanājjanāntam |
S03n242:97: sa puṣpamālī trapughṛṣṭakaṇṭho yaṣṭayā hataḥ sarpamukhaṃ paraitu |
S03n242:98: vaikakṣyabaddhaśca vased gṛheṣu laulyādahārṣīttava yo bisāni ||23 ||
S03n242:100: yo naṣṭamityāha na cāsya naṣṭamiṣṭānsa kāmānadhigamya kāmam |
S03n242:101: upaitu gehāśrita eva mṛtyuṃ bhavatsu yaḥ śaṅkata īdṛśaṃ vā ||24 ||
S03n242:102: atha śakro devendrastena teṣāṃ kāmopabhogaprātikūlyasūcakena śapathātiśayena samutpāditavismayabahumānaḥ svenaiva vapuṣābhijvalatā tānṛṣīnabhigamya sāmarṣavaduvāca-mā tāvadbhoḥ |
S03n242:106: saṃkṣepatastu śrūyatāṃ yadabhisamīkṣya kāmānna praśaṃsanti munayaḥ |
S03n242:115: iti hīnavimadhyamottamānāmiha cāmutra ca yadvadhāya kāmāḥ |
S03n242:117: atha śakro devānāmindrastasya tadvacanaṃ yuktamityabhinandya tena caiteṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ māhātmyenābhiprasāditamanāstebhyaḥ svamaparādhamāviścakāra |
S03n242:124: na bāndhavā naiva vayaṃ sahāyā na te naṭā nāpi viḍambakāḥ smaḥ |
S03n242:130: kṣamāṃ ca tatrātmavatāṃ prapattumato'pyadaścetasi mā sma kārṣīḥ ||33 ||
S03n242:132: tadevaṃ pravivekasukharasajñānāṃ viḍambaneva vihiṃseva ca kāmāḥ pratikūlā bhavanti |
